title: IT-samordnare
description:
Om arbetsplatsen


Vill du vara med och skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för en likvärdig utbildning? Vi på Specialpedagogiska skolmyndigheten, SPSM, arbetar för att alla barn, elever och vuxenstuderande med funktionsnedsättning ska nå målen för sin utbildning. Vi driver egna specialskolor på olika orter i Sverige. Vi erbjuder också stöd till förskolor och skolor i hela landet för att tillsammans skapa lärmiljöer som är utvecklande och tillgängliga. Dessutom fördelar vi statsbidrag och utvecklar läromedel. Tillsammans röjer vi hindren!
  

  

Vi hoppas att du som söker, med din bakgrund och din kompetens, kan bidra till att öka vår mångfald.  

  

Vi arbetar engagerat för att allas lika värde ska bli verklighet. Tillsammans använder vi samarbete och kompetens för att lösa uppdrag. Att utveckla ledarskapet och att öka mångfalden är några saker som just nu finns på vår agenda. Tillsammans bidrar vi till hållbarhet i samhället ekonomiskt, socialt och miljömässigt. Mer om vad vi erbjuder kan du läsa på www.spsm.se/ledigajobb  

  

Verksamhetsområde Stöd och styrning arbetar med ett effektivt internt stöd och en god intern styrning och kontroll. Vi utvecklar vår verksamhet för ett hållbart samhälle. Kommunikation, rättsfrågor, processtöd, ekonomi, verksamhetsstyrning, personalfrågor, kompetensförsörjning, IT-frågor, internservice, upphandling och lokalförsörjning finns i verksamhetsområdet.
  

  

IT-enheten är en del av Verksamhetsområde Stöd och styrning. I enhetens uppdrag ingår att såväl ge service och support till användarna i vår it-miljö som att ansvara för drift och förvaltning av den. I uppdraget ingår även att tillsammans med verksamheten och Digitaliseringsenheten bidra till utveckling av olika systemlösningar. En stor del av driften för våra it-lösningar sker från egen datahall.  

  

Enheten har ett trevligt och harmoniskt klimat med kompetenta medarbetare. Vi finns på flera orter i landet och är idag 24 medarbetare. Vi söker nu en It-samordnare för tjänsteområde It-förvaltning i Örebro.


Arbetsuppgifter


I rollen som It-samordnare deltar du i såväl budget som prognosarbete för samtliga områden som anses vara under den förvaltningsmodell som It-enheten använder. Del av tiden som It-samordnare arbetar man även som systemansvarig.
  

  

It-samordnaren ansvarar för tjänsteområde It-förvaltnings leveranser och framdrift samt är sammankallande för de möten där samtliga systemansvariga samlas för information kring pågående arbeten. Vid samma möten bestämmes även agenda och innehåll för de förvaltningsmöten med verksamheten som genomförs regelbundet.
  

  

It-samordnaren för It-förvaltning är en ordinarie medlem i Digitaliseringsrådet, som ansvarar för att besluta och prioritera myndighetens digitaliseringsarbete. Vid regelbundna It-samordnarmöten avrapporterar du om pågående arbeten inom It-förvaltning för att fånga avvikelser i genomförande och kostnader. Det åligger även It-samordnaren för It-förvaltning att följa upp att respektive systemansvariga skapar förvaltningsplaner och att förvaltningsarbetet löper på enligt plan.
  

  

Som It-samordnare bistår du It-chefer med arbetsledning inom ditt tjänsteområde med att fördela arbetsuppgifter och startar själv uppdrag samt mindre projekt.
  

  

SPSM:s medarbetare finns över hela landet och digitala mötesverktyg är en del av vår vardag, resor förekommer.


Kvalifikationer


Vi söker dig som har  

* en relevant och avslutad eftergymnasial utbildning inom it eller som arbetsgivaren finner lämplig för tjänsten
* minst fem års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling/systemförvaltning i en större organisation
* en förmåga att självständigt utveckla arbetsmetoder och system
* vana av att arbeta självgående och vara operativt drivande
* vana av att leda kollegor och andra resurser i vardagsarbetet
* vana av att arbeta som projektledare med flera olika enheter involverade
* vana av att läsa engelskspråkig facklitteratur
* mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal på svenska alternativt svenskt teckenspråk samt skrift på svenska.

  

Det är meriterande om du har
  

* vana från kravhantering vid utveckling av systemlösningar
* vana från testning av lösningar innan leverans
* vana av att arbeta systematiskt med en förvaltningsmodell
* erfarenhet av arbete i en utbildningsverksamhet/skola
* kompetens av vad tillgängliga lösningar kan innebära
* erfarenhet av Microsoft Dynamics.

  

Personliga egenskaper  

* För dig är ingen uppgift för stor eller för liten utan du löser uppgifter på ett prestigelöst och flexibelt sätt
* Du trivs med att arbeta i grupp men också att driva ditt arbete självständigt inom ditt ansvarsområde
* Du arbetar strukturerat och noggrant samtidigt som du har förmåga att prioritera och arbeta med flera parallella uppdrag
* Du är samarbetsorienterad och har ett positivt bemötande
* Du har en god planerings- och organisationsförmåga och ett utvecklat sinne för noggrannhet och struktur
* Du engagerar dig i vårt arbete med ständiga förbättringar och med dina erfarenheter bidrar till utvecklingsarbete
* Du är intresserad av att effektivisera processer och håller dig uppdaterad om den utveckling som sker.

  

Stor hänsyn tas till personlig lämplighet.
Anställningens omfattning


Tillträde snarast eller enligt överenskommelse.


Ansökan


Referensnummer: 2 STO-2025/462

title: Software Engineer
description:
WirelessCar’s Journey
  
WirelessCar drives the future of mobility by connecting vehicles and developing cutting-edge digital services. We help leading brands—like Volkswagen, Volvo, Subaru, and Jaguar Land Rover—innovate, enhance mobility, and accelerate their digital transformation. Join us and shape the next era of automotive technology!
  
We’re looking for a Software Engineer
  
In this role, you’ll continuously explore the latest technologies and develop cutting edge solutions and services to our customers and together with your team you are responsible for the entire lifecycle of our services.
  
We are looking for creative Software Engineer to join one of our development teams. The team is working closely with the customer and is using a broad tech stack. They are building software that runs in a containerized environment in the car as well as in the cloud.
  
We offer you
  
High-tech company that offers an exciting working environment.
  
Involvement with services and products that drive safety and sustainability.
  
Tech fund where you pick your choice of tech tools.
  
Flat organizational culture founded on trust and autonomy; at WirelessCar, you are not just a number.
  
Work-life balance and free access to the gym at the Gothenburg office.
  
Flexible working hours and a hybrid workplace.
  
  

We believe that you bring
  
We are looking for an open-minded and flexible person who thrives under challenging and changing conditions. You should have prior experience in Connected services, with a natural curiosity, innovative mindset, and a strong ability to analyze and solve problems.
  
The ideal candidate will have the following qualifications and skills:
  
* AWS Certification with hands-on experience in AWS services, including Kinesis, DynamoDB, Fargate, and API Gateway.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Azure Cloud, including cloud resources and architecture best practices.
* Experience with Azure DevOps, including pipelines and artifacts.
* Strong programming skills in Java and Golang, and experience with Docker and gRPC for containerization and microservice communication.
* Familiarity with Datadog for monitoring, Open API for building scalable APIs, and general cloud architecture best practices.
* Fluency in Swedish, English, Mandarin Chinese, and Spanish.


**Beneficial:**  

Jira
  
  

Location
  
At WirelessCar we believe in a Hybrid Remote work set-up. The location for this role is Gothenburg, Sweden.
  
To join our journey
  
WirelessCar is always on the move, often into uncharted land. We are curious, believe in collaboration and are always open to new ideas on how we can make a difference. When you join our journey, you will be part of a great crew of highly competent and warm-hearted people from all over the world.
  
Application Information
  
Does this role sound like a good fit for you? Great! Please answer a few questions and upload your resume. We look forward to receiving your application.
  
Our company language is English so please write your application and CV in English.
  
Last Application Day is the 14th of June.

title: Data Engineer GCP
description:
**Job Title:** Data Engineer – GCP
  
**Location:** Stockholm, Western Europe (Fully Remote)
  
Job Description
  
We’re looking for a Data Engineer for a long-term remote contract to join a team building data solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to support data analysis and ML/AI products.
  
  

**Daily Tasks:**  

Build data products on GCP using DBT and BigQuery
  
Work with solution architects and business experts to design data models
  
Sync data from multiple sources using Cloud Functions and Python
  
Orchestrate pipelines using Terraform and Cloud Workflows
  
Collaborate with data engineers, scientists, and software engineers
  
  

**Nice to Have:**  

Experience with OLAP cubes
  
Experience with Power BI reports
  
  

**Tech Stack:**  

GCP (BigQuery, Cloud Functions, Cloud Workflows), DBT, Python, Terraform, Git, SQL

title: Informationsarkitekt
description:
Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär inom informationsarkitektur och arbeta nära verksamheten i en roll där du kombinerar strategiskt tänk med operativt genomförande? Vi på Pin Rekrytering AB söker nu en senior Informationsarkitekt för ett uppdrag hos ett spännande företag i Stockholm. Du blir anställd av oss på Pin Rekrytering och arbetar som konsult ute hos kund.
  
  

Arbetsuppgifter
  
  

I rollen som Informationsarkitekt får du en nyckelfunktion i ett strategiskt initiativ inom data- och informationshantering. Projektet befinner sig i en etableringsfas med fokus på styrning, organisation, arbetssätt och strukturer kopplat till informationsarkitektur. Du kommer att driva och stödja arbetet inom de prioriterade informationsområdena samt bidra till andra arbetsströmmar inom projektet. Arbetet sker iterativt i nära samarbete med verksamhetsspecialister och experter inom IT, data, arkitektur, kommunikation och utbildning.
  
  

Kvalifikation och erfarenhet
  
  

Flerårig erfarenhet som verksamhets- och informationsarkitekt
  
Erfarenhet av metod- och konceptutveckling samt framtagning av utbildningsmaterial
  
Tidigare arbete i projekt med fokus på data och information
  
Mycket god förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på både svenska och engelska
  
Meriterande med erfarenhet från energi-/infrastrukturbranschen eller anläggningstung verksamhet
  
Vana vid agila arbetssätt är ett plus
  
  

Personliga egenskaper
  
  

Vi söker dig som är analytisk, självgående och målinriktad. Du är kommunikativ och har förmåga att visualisera och förklara komplexa lösningar på ett tydligt och tillgängligt sätt. Du är lyhörd och trivs i samarbeten där du tillsammans med andra löser utmaningar och driver arbetet framåt.
  
  

Utbildning
  
  

Högskoleutbildning, gärna med inriktning mot IT eller motsvarande.
  
  

Om oss
  
  

På Pin Rekrytering förstår vi att varje rekryteringsuppdrag är unikt. Därför engagerar vi oss helhjärtat i att förstå er verksamhet och era specifika behov. Vi är inte bara en rekryteringspartner, utan en del av ert team, dedikerade till att förstå och uppfylla hela er behovsbild. Vårt expertteam av rekryterare är skickliga på att identifiera och attrahera de mest eftertraktade kandidaterna inom era branscher, inklusive specialiserade säljare och ingenjörer.
  
  

Ansökan
  
  

**START:** Enligt överenskommelse
  
  

**OMFATTNING:** Heltid
  
  

**PLACERING:** Stockholm
  
  

**LÖN:** Enligt överenskommelse
  
  

**KONTAKT:** Hermela Nadew
  
  

**SISTA ANSÖKNINGSDATUM:** 2025-06-30
  
  

Denna tjänst är en direktrekrytering där vi på Pin Rekrytering tar hand om hela rekryteringsprocessen men där du blir direkt anställd hos kund. Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan snarast då tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta mig Hermela Nadew på 070-580 73 45 eller hermela.nadew@pinrekrytering.se.

title: IT-Supporttekniker till Hogia
description:
IT-supporttekniker till Hogia – vill du utvecklas i en teknisk roll med kundfokus?
  
  

Har du en känsla för kundservice samt ett stort tekniskt intresse? Sök tjänsten som IT-supporttekniker och bli en del av vårt härliga team på Hogia Infrastructure Services i Stenungsund!
  
  

Om rollen
  
  

Vi söker dig som vill bli en del av vårt supportteam på Hogia Infrastructure Services.
  
  

Du kommer att arbeta med teknisk support och rådgivning till både externa och interna kunder – via telefon, e-post och webb. Frågorna varierar från användarstöd till felsökning, installationer och driftsättning i vår molnplattform HogiaCloud.
  
  

Du kommer bland annat arbeta i system som Active Directory, Microsoft Dynamics, SQL Server Management Studio och på sikt i vår nya lösning med Microsoft EntraID och SSO.
  
  

Vem är du?
  
  

**Vi söker dig som har:**  

* Några års erfarenhet av IT-support, eller motsvarande teknisk bakgrund
* Goda kunskaper i Windowsmiljö och Microsofts produkter (t.ex. Office365, AD)
* Stark servicekänsla
* Förmåga att prioritera, ta initiativ och samarbeta i team


Du har ett genuint teknikintresse, trivs i kontakten med användare och motiveras av att lösa problem och utvecklas. Tjänsten innefattar mycket kommunikation, både internt och externt. Därför är det viktigt att du har god förmåga att kommunicera både muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska.
  
  

Vad erbjuder vi?
  
  

Hos oss får du en vardag fylld av tekniska utmaningar, ett riktigt trevlig gäng att jobba ihop med och möjligheter att växa – antingen som teknisk specialist eller kanske i en ledarroll. Vi tror på kunskapsdelning, prestigelöshet och gemenskap.
  
  

Att jobba hos oss
  
  

Hogia Infrastructure Services lägger stor vikt vid att leverera högsta kvalitet och expertkompetens för alla våra tjänster. Områden vi arbetar inom är Microsoftsystem, molnlösningar, datakommunikation, säkerhetslösningar, projektledning och teknisk rådgivning, allt med drift av Hogias applikationer som kärnverksamhet.
  
  

Med moderna verktyg, vass kompetens och långsiktighet i allt vi gör, bygger vi på Hogia smarta lösningar som gör skillnad för många användare. För oss är det viktigt med hållbarhet oavsett om det gäller våra produkter, lokaler eller dig som medarbetare. Hos oss finns goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och balans mellan jobb och fritid. Vi satsar på hälsa och erbjuder flertalet träningsaktiviteter, underbar havsnära arbetsmiljö och möjlighet att jobba hemifrån ett par dagar i veckan.
  
  

Låter detta intressant för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. För denna tjänst genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll innan tillsättning.
  
  

Om Hogia-gruppen
  
  

Hogia utvecklar, säljer och supportar programvaror och IT-system för företag som effektivt vill fokusera på sina verksamheter i stället för krånglig och tidsödande administration. Vi erbjuder allt från mindre löne- och bokföringsprogram för småföretagaren till kompletta, branschspecifika IT-lösningar och -system för exempelvis kollektivtrafik, åkerier, godsterminaler, revisionsbyråer och fastighetsbolag. I Hogiagruppen finns 30 operativa bolag, som vart och ett verkar inom ett väl definierat verksamhetsområde. Vår organisationsform bygger uttalat på småskalighet och entreprenörsanda. Företagskulturen skapar engagerade medarbetare. Tillsammans ger vi våra kunder de bästa tänkbara affärslösningarna. Hogia startade sin verksamhet 1980 i Stenungsund. I dag har den privatägda koncernen totalt 650 anställda på kontor i Sverige, Norge och Finland. Mer information om Hogia finns på https://www.hogia.se/.

title: Senior IT - Konsult
description:
Qaptive AB är ett Malmöbaserat företag specialiserat inom IT och teknik, med ett starkt fokus på innovation och spetskompetens inom artificiell intelligens. Vi erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar som förenar avancerad teknologi med djupgående expertis, och vår verksamhet drivs av en passion för utveckling och att utforska framtidens möjligheter. Under varumärket frst AI strävar vi efter att vara en ledande aktör inom branschen och skapa verkligt värde för våra kunder. Känner du igen dig? Tveka inte att höra av dig!
  
DevSecOps Engineer – Bygg säker, skalbar infrastruktur med oss!
  
Vi söker nu en Senior DevSecOps Engineer som vill vara med och driva automatiserad och säker mjukvaruleverans till nästa nivå. Hos oss får du jobba med en modern teknologistack, införa DevSecOps-principer i praktiken och lösa komplexa infrastruktur- och säkerhetsutmaningar i molnet.
  
**Om dig:** Du är en erfaren ingenjör med dokumenterad förmåga att:
  
Leverera CI/CD-pipelines med GitHub Actions, GitLab CI och Jenkins
  
Automatisera säker programvaruleverans och infrastruktur som kod (Terraform, CloudFormation)
  
Arbeta med containerplattformar (Kubernetes, EKS, Helm)
  
Säkerställa systemtillförlitlighet och hantera produktionens skarpa lägen
  
Vara en nyfiken problemlösare som gräver tills grundorsaken är hittad
  
  

**Bonus om du har jobbat med:**  

AWS, Serverless, Lambda
  
Säkerhetsverktyg som Grype, SonarQube
  
Övervakning och larm (Grafana, CloudWatch, Opsgenie)
  
  

Vi tror du trivs i en agil miljö och gillar att jobba nära utvecklingsteamen. Tillsammans skapar vi säker, stabil och skalbar mjukvara – utan att tumma på kvalitet eller hastighet.

title: IT/OT Demand Architect
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens digitala landskap inom energisektorn och samtidigt bidra till ett mer hållbart samhälle? Vi på Pin Rekrytering AB söker nu en erfaren och engagerad IT/OT Demand Architect för ett spännande uppdrag hos ett ledande företag i Stockholm. Du blir anställd av oss på Pin Rekrytering och arbetar som konsult ute hos kund.
  
  

Arbetsuppgifter
  
  

I rollen som IT/OT Demand Architect får du en nyckelposition i företagets digitaliseringsresa. Du ansvarar för att skapa och underhålla en övergripande och sammanhängande bild av IT-landskapet, med fokus på både affärsbehov och långsiktig teknisk utveckling. Arbetet sker i nära samarbete med portföljansvariga, lösningsarkitekter, säkerhetsteam och andra intressenter inom organisationen.
  
  

Du deltar i strategiska initiativ, säkerställer att arkitekturval är i linje med företagets övergripande mål och identifierar synergier, risker och förbättringsmöjligheter. Du driver förändring och är en nyckelspelare i projekt kopplade till informations- och IT-säkerhet, systemdokumentation och verksamhetsutveckling.
  
  

Kvalifikation och erfarenhet
  
  

Gedigen erfarenhet som IT-arkitekt i komplexa affärsmiljöer
  
God förståelse för både IT- och OT-lösningar och dess påverkan på verksamheten
  
Förmåga att dokumentera, strukturera och utveckla IT-landskap utifrån affärsstrategi
  
Erfarenhet av arkitekturgranskningar, efterlevnad av regelverk samt informationssäkerhet
  
Vana vid att arbeta nära olika delar av organisationen, från affär till teknik
  
Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift är ett krav
  
Meriterande med erfarenhet från energi-/infrastruktursektorn
  
  

Personliga egenskaper
  
  

Vi tror att du som söker är strukturerad, strategisk och lösningsorienterad. Du har lätt för att kommunicera komplexa tekniska frågor till olika målgrupper och kan agera både som rådgivare och förändringsledare. Du trivs i en föränderlig miljö och motiveras av att skapa långsiktig nytta och värde för verksamheten.
  
  

Utbildning
  
  

Relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom IT, teknik eller liknande område.
  
  

Om oss
  
  

På Pin Rekrytering förstår vi att varje rekryteringsuppdrag är unikt. Därför engagerar vi oss helhjärtat i att förstå er verksamhet och era specifika behov. Vi är inte bara en rekryteringspartner, utan en del av ert team, dedikerade till att förstå och uppfylla hela er behovsbild. Vårt expertteam av rekryterare är skickliga på att identifiera och attrahera de mest eftertraktade kandidaterna inom era branscher, inklusive specialiserade säljare och ingenjörer.
  
  

Ansökan
  
  

**START:** Enligt överenskommelse
  
  

**OMFATTNING:** Heltid
  
  

**PLACERING:** Stockholm
  
  

**LÖN:** Enligt överenskommelse
  
  

**KONTAKT:** Hermela Nadew
  
  

**SISTA ANSÖKNINGSDATUM:** 2025-06-30
  
  

Denna tjänst är en direktrekrytering där vi på Pin Rekrytering tar hand om hela rekryteringsprocessen men där du blir direkt anställd hos kund. Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan snarast då tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta mig Hermela Nadew på 070-580 73 45 eller hermela.nadew@pinrekrytering.se.

title: Senior Network Engineer
description:
About Us
  
Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve exclusively Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights and TUI.
  
Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2300 passionate professionals is what makes us the industry’s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India and Poland.
  
About the role
  
As a Senior Network Engineer at Etraveli Group, you will play a key role in designing, developing, maintaining and optimizing our network infrastructure to ensure high availability, scalability, and resilience. You will work with advanced technologies such as VXLAN, BGP, EVPN to enhance performance and reliability in our LAN and WAN environments.
  
In this role, you will collaborate closely with DevOps, SysOps, Database, Security, and other internal teams to align network solutions with business and technical requirements. Additionally, you will document your work by creating High-Level Designs (HLDs) and Low-Level Designs (LLDs) as well as regular documentation to support implementation and long-term strategy.
  
Main tasks
  
Designing, implementing, optimizing and maintaining Wide Area Network (WAN) and Local Area Network (LAN) infrastructure to support seamless connectivity and efficient communication across multiple geographic locations.
  
Supporting and optimizing WAN/LAN infrastructure across multiple regions.
  
Collaborating closely with internal teams, including security, operations, and application teams, to align network solutions with business requirements, industry best practices, and regulatory compliance standards.
  
Developing and implementing network automation and tools to streamline operational processes, improve service delivery, and minimize manual intervention.
  
Creating and maintaining documentation, including network diagrams, configurations, operational runbooks, and troubleshooting guides, to facilitate knowledge sharing and support ongoing maintenance.
  
Proactively monitoring and analyzing network performance, identifying potential bottlenecks or vulnerabilities, and implementing corrective measures to optimize network efficiency and reliability.
  
Staying up to date of emerging network technologies, industry trends, and security threats, and evaluating their potential impact on the enterprise network architecture.
  
Participating in incident response and troubleshooting activities, providing technical expertise and guidance to resolve network outages or performance issues in a timely manner.
  
Being an active and valuable part of the day to day operations team.
  
  

Your profile
  
You are a detail-oriented, organized, positive, proactive, and solution-oriented team player, with a desire to continuously learn and improve your skills. You possess excellent written and verbal communication skills. With several years of experience in a similar role, you are used to designing, implementing, and maintenance of complex network infrastructures.
  
You have strong technical and analytical expertise and a deep understanding of enterprise networking. You are passionate about designing secure and scalable network architectures and staying up to date with emerging network technologies. As a strategic thinker and hands-on problem solver, you work collaboratively across teams, engaging with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  
Requirements
  
Multiple years of experience in data center network architecture, design and implementation.
  
In-depth experience with enterprise-grade routing, switching, wireless, and network security platforms and technologies spanning LAN, WAN, and Data Center environments.
  
Experience with network automation and programmability concepts and technologies (e.g. Ansible, Python, JSON, APIs and others)
  
Extensive experience in network technologies such as VXLAN, BGP, EVPN
  
Experience in creating Low Level Design, High Level Design, Network Migration Plan and Network Implementation Plan
  
Knowledge of load balancing technologies such as F5, firewalls (Checkpoint), storage (CEPH).
  
Knowledge and experience in cloud solutions (Akamai).
  
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and GitOps practices.
  
  

Benefits
  
Brand New Office in the City, located in the heart of Gothenburg at Merkurhuset, close to public transport and great lunch spots
  
Inclusive Culture Celebrating Diversity; a vibrant team representing many nationalities and cultures as well as regular cultural events and celebrations to share traditions from around the world
  
Afterworks & social gatherings to unwind, socialize, and strengthen team bonds
  
Breakfast at the Office every morning to start the day right
  
Conferences, Workshops and other opportunities for personal and professional growth
  
Wellness Benefit; annual healthcare allowance for gym memberships, massages, or other wellness activities, as per Swedish Tax Agency guidelines.
  
Comprehensive Pension and Health Insurance; full coverage through partners, ensuring quick assistance in case of illness or injury.
  
Hackathons and Dev Week
  
  

At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds. During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.
  
Welcome to Etraveli Group.
  
As part of this recruitment process, we will be conducting background checks. You will be able to read more information and give your consent to this process in the application form.

title: Senior Software Engineer (Test)
description:
Senior Software Engineer (Test) – Cloud Alerting Services team
  
At Cloud Alerting Services team we’re dedicated to developing high-quality microservices and micro frontend services for Qlik Cloud Analytics. As a Test Automation Engineer, you’ll collaborate closely with developers to ensure the quality of our feature deliveries.
  
With an experienced team and a mature organization, you’ll find stability in your work environment, ample opportunities for growth and development, and the chance to influence our daily work and future directions.
  
If you consider yourself a skilled test developer, or even a developer, and are looking for a real challenge, this is a tremendous opportunity to make key contributions within a high-profile team for one of the best technology companies in data integration and analytics solutions.
  
What makes this role interesting?
  
**Develop deep cloud knowledge:** Gain in-depth understanding of Qlik’s architecture and cloud infrastructure, particularly in AWS.
  
**Collaborative Environment:** Work alongside developers and test engineers in a supportive team environment.
  
**Impactful Contributions:** Ensure the quality of our feature deliveries, directly impacting our products’ success.
  
**Professional Growth:** Benefit from stability, growth opportunities, and a chance to shape our future directions.
  
  

**Here’s how you’ll be making an impact:**  

**Requirements Investigation:** Assess how new requirements and features fit into the automation test suite as well as understanding scope and estimate risk. Work with relevant stakeholders to ensure that deliverables meet requirements.
  
**Test Case Implementation:** Develop new test cases at integration and component levels as necessary.
  
**Test Planning:** Create and execute comprehensive test plans. Present product quality on checkpoint meetings identifying risks, test gaps and test results.
  
**Environment Monitoring:** Monitor test environments, investigating failures and performance issues.
  
**Automation improvement:** Design, develop, and maintain functionality and infrastructure for the test tools and frameworks.
  
**Collaborative Approach:** Work closely with team members, architects, developers, and stakeholders to achieve project milestones in an iterative and incremental development process.
  
**Quality Advocacy:** Contribute actively to the future of quality and testing at Qlik by participating in our test community and playing a role in shaping our test strategy for ongoing improvement.
  
  

**We’re looking for a teammate with:**  

At least bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering and management or similar field.
  
A genuine interest in SW architecture from an end-to-end perspective.
  
Proficiency in at least one scripting/coding language.
  
Experience with containerized deployments and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes, Helm, Docker).
  
Experience from working in cloud environments (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP) with knowledge in the domain of infrastructure, monitoring and troubleshooting.
  
Strong understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practices.
  
The ability to articulate the current status, blocking issues, and task estimates. 
  
The ability to work both as a team and as an individual. 
  
A strong sense of responsibility and good at taking initiatives. 
  
Excellent verbal and written English skills as the company language is English. 
  
  

**Desired Qualifications:**  

Experience using Agile software development methods like SCRUM or Kanban.
  
Familiarity with metrics and monitoring tools like Dynatrace, Prometheus, and Grafana.
  
Experience in Test automation, API testing, and performance testing.
  
Experience of using Git, Github, and Jira.
  
Solid scripting and programming skills (JavaScript, NodeJS).
  
Strong analytical skills, ability to find unconventional solutions to problems and open minded to innovation and new solutions. 
  
A broad technical interest and like to stay up to date on the latest advances in the software field. 
  
A true interest in taking initiatives and is serious about continuous learning. 
  
  

**The location for this role is:**  

Lund, Sweden (hybrid)

title: Network Engineer
description:
About Etraveli Group
  
Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve exclusively Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights and TUI.
  
Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2000 passionate professionals is what makes us the industry’s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India, Poland.
  
Are you ready to be a cornerstone of innovation in a company experiencing rapid global expansion? We're now seeking a highly motivated Network Engineer.
  
Who You Are
  
As a Network Engineer at Etraveli Group, you will be working with like-minded people who, just like you, are genuinely interested in technical support of anything related to networking. We focus on private cloud implementations using OpenStack but with a hybrid cloud environment also connected to public cloud solutions.
  
A few of the technologies we use are Linux, BGP, VXLAN, EVPN and Ansible and we would appreciate previous exposure to technologies like Akamai CDN, OpenStack, Docker or Kubernetes.
  
About the Role
  
  

**Your day to day work with involve:**  

Working with Arista routers, Checkpoint firewalls and F5 & A10 load balancers.
  
Design, create, improve and maintain our network infrastructure so that it is easy to deploy, scalable, performant, secure and fault-tolerant.
  
Network and infrastructure design, maintenance and troubleshooting.
  
Support and manage load balancers, including VIP creation, load balancing algorithms and health checks options. Together with the skilled set of DevOps/Infrastructure/Database engineers you will troubleshoot network related issues
  
  

Requirements
  
You are a network engineer with at least 5 years of experience working with on-prem data center networks.
  
You have worked with routing protocols such as BGP, EVPN and encapsulation protocols like VXLAN.
  
Creating and implementing network infrastructure with redundancy, security and scalability in mind is second nature to you.
  
You are flexible and can quickly change focus depending on priorities.
  
You don't need to have any official network related certifications, the most important thing is your knowledge within network operations and of course your attitude and "can-do" spirit.
  
You are used to working in a team where English is the preferred language and you are good at documenting.
  
To be perfect for this role, you always want to learn new technologies and have a sense of envisioning existing implementations’ improvements.
  
  

Benefits
  
When working at Etraveli Group you will always feel that you are trusted and that you can rely on others to help you. To work together as a team and feel that you are challenged in a way that helps you evolve within your profession. You will have awesome colleagues together with whom you will solve complex problems in a fast-moving business. But not just that.
  
What else do we offer?
  
Brand new office in the City – We are located in Merkurhuset, Skeppsbron, in central Gothenburg, just a stone's throw away from public transport and lunch restaurants.
  
Conferences – We believe in personal development and continuous education. We continuously organize internal trainings and workshops so that we can learn from each other.
  
Healthcare allowance – Each employee receives a maximum allowable amount each year according to the Swedish Tax Agency to spend on health-promoting activities such as a gym card, massage etc.
  
Pension and health insurance – Through partners we offer a comprehensive pension and health insurance so that you can get help quickly in case of an accident.
  
Hackaton and Dev week – We believe in fostering creativity and testing new things. Therefore, we have recurring Hackaton and Dev weeks where the teams decide what they want to work on.
  
To kick the day off just right, we serve breakfast at the office every morning.
  
  

At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds. During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.
  
Welcome to Etraveli Group.
  
As part of this recruitment process, we will be conducting background checks. You will be able to read more information and give your consent to this process in the application form.
company_description: Etraveli Group is a global platform for flights, an air technology company with a presence across all continents.

title: Medior IT Technician - Packaging and Deployment
description:
About AIonSI
  
As our Stockholm office keeps growing, we are now looking to hire more world-class engineers focused on expertise. You will have the chance to work closely with your colleagues and manager to develop your future skill set.
  
  

**Your Role:**  

As the Packaging Specialist for the competence area Application Packaging you will be part of the team that is responsible for the packaging process of the clients at our Business Units.
  
* Perform package dispatcher tasks as are application setup documentation, application testing, mainly handled via AMO portal
* Perform mass application distributions and removals via the application deployment system Intune / SCCM
* Maintain packaged applications in related systems as are: Client Software catalog, Active Directory
* Work with the ticket allocation system BMC-Remedy
* Handle of mainly PowerShell, but also VBS, BAT, scripts
* Troubleshooting tasks around MSI / App-V / MSIX package related issues
* Create reports and template reports in SQL, Power BI
* Support Technical Product Roadmaps
* Support Incidents, Problem Management, Critical Incidents, etc.
* Technical project support


Your profile
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Bachelor's degree
  
10-15 years' experience in IT
  
High experience in application packaging and PowerShell scripting
  
Experienced in creating / maintaining a managed enterprise client
  
Knowledge in Microsoft related Client/Server/Cloud products
  
Knowledge and experience with MDT / SCCM / Intune and other deployment technologies
  
Experience in action ITIL processes
  
Good knowledge in IT security
  
A proven ability to communicate with technical experts, customers and other stakeholders
  
Ability to manage stakeholders at times of conflicting interests
  
A very good ability to work independently on assignments within a set timetable, sets own priorities
  
The ability to build trust and confidence and to be a team player in an international team
  
Fluent in English, both written and spoken
  
  

**Meritorious:**  

An Master's degree in a technical field or the equivalent level of education
  
Experience in customer transition & offshore projects
  
Troubleshooting/Problem solving skills and providing L3 support
  
Knowledge deployment of the application and testing of the MSI application
  
  

**Personality:**  

You enjoy working both independently, self-driven, and in a small diverse team and you are focused on reaching results on time. You are not afraid to come up with suggestions of improvement, have excellent communication skills, are highly motivated and are a constantly developing type of person.
  
**Website:** Stockholm
  
**Start date:** Flexible
  
  

Feel free to apply through our website www.aionsi.com or through Linkedin. For questions, please reach out to indrasenareddy.maru@aionsi.com
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: System Architect, Epiroc Electrification Solutions (EES)
description:
The fleet of connected assets (batteries, chargers, energy storage systems etc.) is global, and several platforms and technologies are used to make sure that our assets get connected, that data is being transferred and stored, and that the correct data is made available - All in a secure way.  

We are building a new unit to manage all EES assets from a connected perspective and to develop and sell digital services. One crucial aspect is to keep track of the generated data and ensure its correct usage according to laws, regulations, and business needs. This is as important as maintaining the structure and versions of all our physical parts.  

Join us as we accelerate the transformation!  

**Our team**

Be part of a forward-thinking team that is transforming the future of connected products and digital services. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge IoT projects and drive meaningful change in the mining industry. Our collaborative and inclusive work environment offers numerous opportunities for professional growth. Join us in the transformation of electrification and contribute to a cleaner, greener environment.  

**Your mission**

As a System Architect specializing in IoT, Connected Products, and Digital Services, you will be instrumental in developing and optimizing solutions in Azure that leverage IoT data to support electrification in mines. You will work within the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) to ensure that our initiatives are aligned with agile principles and practices, driving innovation and efficiency in our connected product ecosystem.  

Key Responsibilities:
* **Architecture Design**: Develop and maintain the architecture for IoT-enabled products and digital services, ensuring scalability, security, and performance within Azure.
* **IoT Data Integration**: Design and implement solutions for integrating IoT data into Azure, enabling real-time data processing and analytics to support electrification in mines.
* **Value Stream Optimization**: Collaborate with stakeholders to map and optimize value streams, enhancing the flow of value through our IoT and digital service offerings.
* **Agile Practices**: Work within the Scaled Agile Framework to facilitate continuous improvement and delivery, ensuring alignment with agile methodologies.
* **Solution Development**: Partner with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy solutions that leverage IoT data for improved product functionality and service delivery.
* **Technical Leadership**: Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams, ensuring best practices in IoT, Azure, and agile development.
* **Stakeholder Communication**: Act as a liaison between business units, technical teams, and external partners to ensure clear communication and alignment on project goals and deliverables.
* **Performance Metrics**: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success and impact of IoT and digital service initiatives.
* **Documentation:** Create comprehensive documentation including architectural diagrams, technical specifications, and user stories.

  


**Your profile**

The ideal candidate should hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. You must have proven experience as a System Architect, preferably in IoT, connected products, or digital services. A strong understanding of Azure technologies, IoT data integration, and value stream mapping is essential. Familiarity with the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) and agile methodologies is required. You should possess excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills, along with the ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.  


**Why Epiroc?**

By joining our team, you’ll make a big difference in the energy transition. At Epiroc, we take pride in being passionate innovators, driving the change toward a brighter future for both people and the planet. Guided by our values of Collaboration, Commitment, and Innovation, we foster a culture of trust, growth, and lasting impact.  



To support your journey, we offer a competitive Total Rewards Package, including:  


* Global career opportunities
* Learning & Development programs
* Benefits package, including variable compensation (bonus)
* Flexible work culture promoting balance and well-being
* Global Parental Leave Policy
* Community involvement

  


**Location and travel**

This position is located in Örebro, Sweden and occasional travel is required.  

**Application and contact information**

We encourage you to submit your application through our online career site as soon as possible, but no later than June 16th, 2025. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, and the position may be filled before last application date.  

  

We are committed to a thorough recruitment process, including interviews, reference checks and assessments. To ensure a safe working environment, we conduct identity checks and drug and alcohol screening. Our process is designed to be fair and inclusive; you can expect transparent communication and a balanced evaluation of your skills and experience.  

  

For questions about the position, please contact: Hiring Manager, Mattias Wide, mattias.wide@external.epiroc.com  

  

For questions about the recruitment process or application please contact: Zuzana Kalivodova Recruitment Specialist zuzana.kalivodova@epiroc.com  

**It all starts with people.** The world needs metals and minerals for the energy transition and our cities and infrastructure must be developed to serve a growing population. To succeed, we need to speed up the shift towards more sustainable mining and construction industries. We at Epiroc accelerate this transformation, together with customers and business partners in more than 150 countries, by developing and providing innovative and safe equipment, digital solutions, and aftermarket support. All new thinkers are welcome. We are looking for those who want to develop, grow, and dare to think new. In Epiroc we attract, develop, and retain diverse talent valuing authenticity and unique perspectives, driving our spirit of innovation. We foster an inclusive culture where diversity isn't just a goal but a part of our values and way of working. This is how we do business for a sustainable future. Learn more at www.epiroc.com

title: IT Systems Administrator
description:
Lund, Skåne County, Sweden


Category: Information Technology Hire Type: Employee
**Job ID** 6898 **Date posted** 04/21/2025  
**We Are:**


At Synopsys, we drive the innovations that shape the way we live and connect. Our technology is central to the Era of Pervasive Intelligence, from self-driving cars to learning machines. We lead in chip design, verification, and IP integration, empowering the creation of high-performance silicon chips and software content. Join us to transform the future through continuous technological innovation.

 **You Are:**


You are a tech-savvy and passionate Systems Administrator ready to join our European Information Technology team. With a strong foundation in both Windows and Unix operating systems, you are adept at problem-solving and possess a solution-oriented mindset. Your understanding of networking fundamentals and the ability to quickly analyze and respond to situations make you an invaluable asset. You are not only technically proficient but also possess excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, in English.


You are preferably located in Sweden, or alternatively in France or Portugal.

 **What You’ll Be Doing:**

* Deploying and managing Windows and Linux PC systems.
* Installing and maintaining network and server equipment.
* Collaborating with IT teams on automation projects for various tasks.
* Providing support for internal teams in Sweden, France, and other locations.
* Traveling to vendor sites and international locations as needed.
* Resolving system-related issues and providing updates to automation processes.

 **The Impact You Will Have:**

* Enhancing the efficiency and reliability of our IT infrastructure.
* Ensuring seamless operation of our systems across multiple locations.
* Contributing to the success of high-visibility projects.
* Improving user experience through effective system support and issue resolution.
* Driving innovation in system automation and deployment.
* Supporting the development and integration of cutting-edge technologies.

 **What You’ll Need:**

* Bachelor’s degree or 2 years equivalent experience within a technology-based program or industry.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and strong logical reasoning.
* Understanding of Windows OS and Unix operating systems, including Linux.
* Excellent English writing and speaking skills.
* Fundamental understanding of TCP/IP networking.
* Ability to analyze situations quickly and respond decisively.
* Experience with common ticket resolution processes and SLAs.
* Ability to articulate technical details clearly and concisely.
* Physical ability to lift 40 pounds occasionally or move a negligible amount frequently.
* Willingness to travel within Europe.

 **Who You Are:**

* Energetic and eager to learn modern technologies.
* A team player who can work independently with minimal supervision.
* Detail-oriented and dedicated to delivering high-quality work.
* Calm under pressure when interacting with internal customers.
* Proactive and positive, embodying the “Yes, If” mindset.

 **The Team You’ll Be A Part Of:**


You will join a dynamic and collaborative team within the European Information Technology department. Our team is responsible for supporting all computing requirements across Europe, ensuring seamless operation and reliability of our systems. We work closely with various IT teams and internal users, driving innovation and efficiency in our IT infrastructure.

 **Rewards and Benefits:**


We offer a comprehensive range of health, wellness, and financial benefits to cater to your needs. Our total rewards include both monetary and non-monetary offerings.


At Synopsys, we want talented people of every background to feel valued and supported to do their best work. Synopsys considers all applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, military veteran status, or disability.
company_description: Synopsys is a valued partner for silicon to systems design across a wide range of vertical markets, empowering technology innovators with the industry’s most comprehensive and trusted solutions.

title: Senior Mjukvaruarkitekt- hands on coding
description:
Vill du vara en del av ett företag där din tekniska expertis gör en verklig skillnad? Som senior mjukvaruarkitekt får du möjligheten att vara ledande i att ta fram den bäst lämpade lösningen för kunden. Du behöver därför ha förmågan att diskutera, förklara samt motivera dina arkitekturella val. Som senior arkitekt bör du ha bred erfarenhet av olika tekniska plattformar och mjukvarulösningar med förmågan att se helheten. Du förväntas även ha lång erfarenhet som utvecklare och en öppenhet för att skriva, granska och felsöka kod i rollen som mjukvaruarkitekt.


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**

* Har minst 8 års erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling
* Arbetat ett par år i en liknande roll och vet vilka verktyg och metoder som är lämpliga.
* Har erfarenhet av att bygga cloud native applikationer på någon av molnplattformarna, AWS, Azure eller GCP.
* Har erfarenhet av att orientera dig i komplexa miljöer och organisationer.
* Trivs med att omsätta verksamhetskrav till design av säkra, skalbara samt kostnadseffektiva lösningar.
* Har erfarenhet av att ha jobbat med både frontend- och backend-utveckling.
* Har erfarenhet av att designa och bygga API:er.
* Har erfarenhet att jobba med säkerhet, tex hotmodellering.
* Har erfarenhet att bygga och underhålla system med olika typer av databaser.
* Stark vilja att leverera utmärkt service, med fokus på kundens behov och framgång.
* Djup förståelse för DevOps-principer och förmåga att integrera dem i arkitekturella beslut.
* Bra på att kommunicera.
* Språk: Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.

**Arbetsplats**  

Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Malmö med omnejd.


**Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det.


Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Malmös tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev , en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.


**Förmåner och praktisk information:**

* Kontinuerligt lärande: Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Ledighet och pension: Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.
* Hälsa och välbefinnande: Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret.
* Verktyg och utrustning: Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.

**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande.


För eventuella frågor, kontakta Sanna Ekelöf, vår rekryterare, på sanna.ekelof@devoteam.com. Sanna kommer att vara din primära kontaktperson under hela rekryteringsprocessen.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Verksamhetsutvecklare
description:
Har du erfarenhet av verksamhetsutveckling och trivs i en miljö i förändring, där du får arbeta nära både verksamheten och IT-utvecklingen? Vill du vara med och påverka en handläggares hela situation? Då kan det här vara en roll för dig. Var med och gör samhället möjligt!
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 Som verksamhetsutvecklare är du en nyckelperson i arbetet runt den förflyttning Skatteverket gör mot en informationsdriven och digitaliserad verksamhet. Du arbetar inom området Gemensamma tjänster, och vårt uppdrag är att stötta alla Skatteverkets verksamhetsområden och andra anslutna myndigheter med generella, återanvändbara lösningar. Vi använder SAFe som agilt ramverk och vi arbetar tillsammans med de andra avdelningarna i agila utvecklingsvärdeströmmar/tåg.
   

  

 Skatteverket genomför just nu en omfattande förnyelse av verksamheten för att effektivisera våra arbetssätt internt, vilket bland annat innebär ökad digitalisering och ökat fokus på en handläggares hela situation. Vi söker därför en verksamhetsutvecklare som kan ta lead och staka ut vägen framåt, i tät samverkan med andra verksamhetsutvecklare och andra mer tågnära roller. Du driver och förankrar aktivt våra frågor, och du företräder oss i olika forum på Skatteverket. Du arbetar med att utreda behov, analysera, och föreslå initiativ som utvecklar verksamheten. I rollen ingår att presentera och kommunicera komplexa förändringsbehov i verksamheten.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet till ständig utveckling och lärande i arbetet. Du har kunniga kollegor som du utbyter erfarenheter med och du kan utveckla både bredd och spets hos oss. Tack vare att vi är en stor it-organisation men närmare 1500 medarbetare kan vi erbjuda goda möjligheter till intern rörlighet. Det är viktigt för oss att du har balans mellan jobb och fritid och vi erbjuder bland annat flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet att jobba delvis hemifrån. Du får en friskvårdstimme i veckan och friskvårdsbidrag.
   

  

 Skatteverkets IT-avdelning arbetar aktivt för att främja en inkluderande arbetsplats som präglas av jämställdhet och mångfald där alla medarbetare får lika möjligheter att bidra och utvecklas. Läs mer på Jobba med IT hos oss
   

  

 Du tillhör IT-avdelningen, med placering i Sundbyberg.
   

  

**Om dig**
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.
   

  

 I det här jobbet ska du:
   

  

* vara drivande och resultatinriktad samt se till både gruppens och din egen prestation
* kunna analysera informationsflöden, se samband, mönster och göra avgränsningar
* ha goda ledaregenskaper
* ha förmåga att se helheten och presentera information som är relevant i sammanhanget
* ha god samarbetsförmåga, vara hjälpsam och ha ett gott bemötande
* ha förmåga att kunna se och förbättra hur dina, och din omgivnings, arbetsuppgifter genomförs
* ha förmågan och viljan att lära dig nya saker, vara flexibel och kunna ställa om vid förändringar
* kunna kommunicera vårt budskap i olika typer av forum och målgrupper, samt kunna utrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska.


 Du ska även ha:
   

  

* relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom verksamhetsutveckling
* arbetslivserfarenhet inom SAFe
* relvant arbetslivserfarenhet i rollen som Epic Owner
* erfarenhet av att arbeta myndighetsövergripande
* erfarenhet av att leda workshops
* erfarenhet av arbete med att strukturerat fånga behov och genomföra krav- samt intressentanalyser.


 Det är önskvärt att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta på Skatteverket. Det är även önskvärt att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta inom verksamhetsförmågan analys, samt med organisationsgemensamma tjänster.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.
   

  

 När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/451 | Kontakt: Annika Mohr Singh, Sektionschef annika.mohr.singh@skatteverket.se, Therese Schönbeck, HR-specialist therese.schonbeck@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, Therese Sjödin, Seko therese.sjodin@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2025-06-02 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-06-09

title: Senior Manager IT Audit (m/f/d)
description:
**We are looking for a
   

  

 Senior Manager IT Audit (** 
**m/f/d)**
**(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at our locations in Berlin, Verl, and Amsterdam – flexible working conditions available**
**What You Bring To This Position**
* Completed studies in either Computer Science, IT Security, Information Security, Cyber Security, IT Governance/Management, or a related discipline.
* 5+ years of experience in auditing or consulting companies in regulated industries, ideally in the financial sector, focusing on IT/Tech.
* Specialized knowledge in Access Controls, API and Web Service Security, Configuration Management, Cloud Security, Authentication and Authorization, Secure Communication, and Penetration Testing.
* Best practices experience in end-to-end IT audits, including scoping, fieldwork, reporting, and follow-up activities, following a risk-based auditing, including control testing.
* Experience with standards such as ISO 27001:2022, BSI C5, ITIL, and COBIT is advantageous.
* You have excellent English language skills; German language skills are a big plus.
* Certifications such as CISA, CISM, CRISC, CISSP, Azure AZ/DP, or AWS “Certified” are highly advantageous.
* You are willing to travel nationally and internationally (up to 20%) when needed, while 80% working from home is possible.


**What will be your challenge?**
* Plan audits on a short-term, mid-term, and long-term risk-based approach.
* Conduct internal audits focused on tech areas within the regulated and non-regulated entities of Riverty.
* Coordinate audit requests and perform audit defense on external IT assessments in the second line of defense.
* Report directly to management about audit results and consolidate results to show trends to management.
* Discuss mitigating measures with the auditees and follow up on the mitigation plans in a planned manner.
* Ensure compliance with internal and external information security-related requirements, such as DORA, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, or ISO 22301.
* Additionally, you will plan and execute third—and partly fourth-party audits in the context of the Digital Operational Resilience Act (DORA).


 #EUR13
   

  

**Benefits:**
* At Riverty, you can be who you are. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment and a culture of appreciation, enriched by our employee networks.
* Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
* Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities! Enhance your skills with training offered by the Bertelsmann University, language courses, or leadership training.
* Benefit from our discounts on Bertelsmann products and financial incentives.
* With our diverse work models, you can tailor your work to your preferences. Take advantage of mobile office, flexible working hours, and part-time models.

title: Enterprise Architect - People Tech
description:
**Job Description**
 We at H&M Group, have a vision to liberate fashion for the many. Our Enterprise Architecture team helps align and enable business and tech, provide holistic architecture direction and governance, balancing the long-term and the short-term. Using robust frameworks and best practices they support an effective and efficient tech delivery.
   

  

 To strengthen our team, we are now hiring more Enterprise Architects to further level up our support to business and tech in several areas.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Our architecture landscape is divided into segments, where the Colleague segment covers our Talent management, Workforce management, Collaboration, Knowledge management, Compensation, Travel & Expense, HR Operations, IT Operating model, Portfolio management & corporate capabilities.
   

  

 As an Enterprise Architect – People, you will play a key role in shaping the future of HR, Collaboration and workforce management technology in a fast-evolving enterprise environment. You will work cross-functionally to define, optimize, and evolve our Collboration and HR technology landscape while enabling seamless Employee experiences across all touchpoints.
   

  

**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
**Technology Strategy & Business Alignment:**
* Define and drive the HR business functional & technology architecture, ensuring alignment with business strategy to enhance workforce efficiency, talent management, and operational effectiveness.
* Lead the transition from current to future state architectures, ensuring seamless execution through structured stakeholder engagement.
* Identify cross-dependencies between business processes and technology, guiding capability development, process improvements, and digital transformation initiatives.


**Architectural Governance & Optimization:**
* Establish and maintain enterprise-wide architecture principles, frameworks, and roadmaps to standardize HR technologies.
* Evaluate and improve the HR tech landscape, reducing technical debt, optimizing integration, and enhancing end-to-end business value.
* Assess industry trends and emerging technologies (AI, automation, RPA) to determine their potential impact on HR systems and workforce management.


**Strategic Leadership & Decision Support:**
* Guide and coach stakeholders on investment decisions, balancing risks, costs, and business priorities.
* Support in defining and implementing new operating models and technology-driven HR initiatives.
* Collaborate with third-party vendors, ensuring strategic partnerships align with business objectives and technology roadmaps.
* Work closely with architects across Talent, Workforce, Compensation, Collaboration, HR Operations, and Travel & Expense segments to integrate People technology solutions.
* Oversee solution design, integration development, and roadmap execution, ensuring HR technology delivers tangible business outcomes.
* Participate in enterprise architecture practices, fostering best practices and knowledge sharing across teams.


**YOU’LL WORK WITH**
 As an Enterprise Architect, you will collaborate closely with business stakeholder & architects across different segments, ensuring seamless integration between People, Employee Experience, and the broader enterprise architecture. You will work alongside Solution Architects, Enterprise Architects, and System Architects to define, optimize, and evolve our technology landscape while ensuring alignment with enterprise-wide strategies. Your role will bridge employee experience with other architectural segments, enabling a cohesive and scalable ecosystem that supports business objectives across all touchpoints.
   

  

**Who You Are**
**We are looking for people with..**
* Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related fields. Certifications in Enterprise Architecture frameworks (TOGAF) are a plus.
* 15+ years of experience in software engineering, business technology, or related roles, with 10+ years in a Solution or Enterprise Architecture capacity.
* 5+ years of experience in multiple segments, preferably within Retail/B2C industry.
* Experience working with business & tech stakeholders, using EA tools like LeanIX for architecture documentation and visualization.
* Strong knowledge of HR technologies across talent acquisition, workforce planning, compensation, collaboration, and HR operations.
* Experience in AI, automation, data analytics, and RPA for HR processes.
* Toolchain for I IT Operating model, Portfolio management & corporate capabilities
* Proven track record in architecture governance, defining standards, and leading cross-functional initiatives.
* Experience in vendor management and strategic third-party relationships to drive HR technology innovation.


**Good to Have:**
* Experience in business strategy, operating model development, portfolio management, and HR transformation initiatives.
* Exposure to enterprise risk, security, and compliance management in HR systems.
* Knowledge of sustainability, health, and safety management technologies.


**LOCATION:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. Read more about us here
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Client Partner
company_industry: Utilities Administration and Food and Beverage Services
description:
**Role: Client Partner** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden** 




**Start Date: Immediately** 




  





**Your Responsibilities** 




  





**Relationship Management:** 




 - Cultivate and maintain client relationships at all levels.
 



 - Ensure the highest levels of client satisfaction are achieved according to set targets.
 



 - Monitor, assess, and evaluate engagements, proposing key improvements to CXO-level stakeholders.
 



 - Lead key governance meetings at strategic and tactical levels.
 



  





**Business Growth:** 




 - Lead the entire sales process for the account, from deal identification to guiding the customer and TCS team through the deal lifecycle.
 



 - Lead development of compelling business solutions tailored for client needs and win new business at clients.
 



 - Create an account plan and sales strategy that ensures the attainment of the company’s revenue and pipeline targets.
 



  





**Delivery and Team Management:** 




 - Ensure services are delivered smoothly to clients, managing targets and delivering on-time and on-budget.
 



 - Lead and manage the account team in a global delivery model.
 



 - Focus on continual improvements across all KPIs of the account relationship.
 



 - Travel as required by business needs.
 



  





**Your Qualifications** 




 - Possess a CXO-level presence and gravitas, demonstrating the ability to engage effectively with CXOs on strategic topics in a purposeful and credible manner.
 



 - Proven hands-on experience in delivering customer-centric solutions, including large-scale projects and managed services covering applications, infrastructure, IT security, and business process services. Deep understanding of Agile methodologies.
 



 - Established track record of nurturing and expanding client relationships into strategic partnerships with significant business impact.
 



 - Capability to lead and win large deals, combined with a robust C-level network. Adept at identifying client needs and proposing appropriate solutions and offerings from TCS.
 



 - Proficient in managing account financials.
 



 - Experience in working within a global, multicultural firm environment.
 



 - A minimum of 15 years of experience in the IT industry.
 



 - Bachelor’s degree or higher qualification.
 



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **r.naveen2@tcs.com** 




  





**ABOUT US:** 




  





**Tata Consultancy Services** 
 is a digital transformation and technology partner of choice for industry-leading organizations worldwide. Since its inception in 1968, TCS has upheld the highest standards of innovation, engineering excellence and customer service.
 



  





 Rooted in the heritage of the Tata Group, TCS is focused on creating long term value for its clients, its investors, its employees, and the community at large. With a highly skilled workforce of over 607,000 consultants in 55 countries and 180 service delivery centers across the world, the company has been recognized as a top employer in six continents. With the ability to rapidly apply and scale new technologies, the company has built long term partnerships with its clients – helping them emerge as perpetually adaptive enterprises. Many of these relationships have endured into decades and navigated every technology cycle, from mainframes in the 1970s to Artificial Intelligence today.
 



  





 TCS sponsors 14 of the world’s most prestigious marathons and endurance events, including TCS Lidingöloppet, TCS London Marathon and TCS Amsterdam Marathon with a focus on promoting health, sustainability, and community empowerment. TCS generated consolidated revenues of over US $30 billion in the fiscal year ended March 31, 2025.
 



  





 With a history of over 45 years in Europe, TCS is a transformation partner for companies in industries that range from banking and retail to insurance and travel. Our agile and diverse workforce is distributed in 62 offices across Europe.
 



  




* TCS has been ranked number 1 in Customer Satisfaction in Europe for 12 consecutive years.
* TCS has been named Top Employer in Europe for 13 consecutive years
* TCS has been recognized as one of the world’s Top 50 Brands by Kantar BrandZ in 2025
* 80,000 associates are supporting clients in Europe.



  





 For more information, visit www.tcs.com
 



 Follow TCS on
 
 LinkedIn
 
 |
 
 Instagram
 
 |
 
 YouTube
 




  





**Privacy Note:** 




**https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

title: IT Manager Shared Powertrain IT
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 Are you ready to lead and innovate at the intersection of IT and production? Join Scania as an IT Manager for Shared Powertrain IT and drive our transformation journey!
   

  

 In this role, your team will work close to the production units within Powertrain IT and our other IT teams in the section. Your team will work with creating a plan for how to take our current IT landscape in our production units towards the Scanias target architecture to prepare it for the introduction of the new ERP system SAP. Your team are also supporting our other IT teams by providing them with architecture solutions and identifying new business needs and translate them into digital solutions.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 Your main responsibilities include:
   

  

  

* Strategic Development: Actively contribute to and focus on cross-collaboration and strategic development within IT.
* Vision and Direction: Contribute to IT vision, creating prerequisites for a flow-oriented way of working that improves day-to-day deliveries and secures the cross-functional E2E perspective.
* Digital Solutions: Proactively identify business needs and translate them into digital solutions.
* Team Leadership: Coach the team, inspire continuous improvement, and ensure the team's competence development in new technologies and secure a game changer mindset.
* Cost Management: Actively challenge IT costs to ensure maximum value.


**Who You Are**
 We are looking for an experienced manager with relevant education or experience in IT. We believe you are a leader who values agility, innovation and collaboration. Your ability to see beyond the present and plan for the future is important to us. You are open to change, take initiative and drive the organization forward with Scania’s goals and values as benchmarks. You believe in a learning organization and create conditions for the team to grow and develop. You have the ability to build relationships both internally and externally and see collaboration as the key to success.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 Today, we are approximately 70 employees distributed in 6 team where 5 of the teams are in Södertälje and 1 in Luleå. We are now searching for our new colleague who is curious to take on this challenging and exiting position as IT manager for the Shared Powertrain IT team.
   

  

 The team responsible for IT deliveries within the Shared Powertrain IT team, have many ongoing and upcoming initiatives driven by new business models and Industry 4.0. We will also implement a new ERP system to modernize our system landscape and support the growing business demands. This requires an experienced manager who has the ability and motivation to manage a complex IT delivery, which takes place both locally and globally. To secure the high load of IT demands, the IT delivery have both own IT development and managed service set ups.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-06-17. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: Albert Isik
   

  

 Section Manager, albert.isik@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Technical Support Manager (Nordics & APAC)
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

**About the role:**
 As a
 **Technical Support Manager,**
